abstract: Mixing cajoling with communicating, brandishing statistics or stirring emotion, Bill Clinton, the former U.S. president and U.N. special envoy for Haiti called on the Davos crowd to join the effort to rebuild the devastated island.
snippet: Mixing cajoling with communicating, brandishing statistics or stirring emotion, Bill Clinton, the former U.S. president and U.N. special envoy for Haiti called on the Davos crowd to join the effort to rebuild the devastated island.

headline.main: Clinton Appeals to Business Leaders on Haiti
